hadiths.text: ‘A’ishah said :A Makhzuml woman used to borrow goods and deny having received them. The prophet (ﷺ) gave orders that her hand should be cut off. He (the narrator) then narrated the tradition similar to the one transmitted by Qutaibah from al-Laith from Ibn Shahib. This version adds: The prophet(ﷺ) had her hand cut off

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْقَطْعِ فِي الْعَارِيَةِ إِذَا جُحِدَتْ
chapter.eng-name: Cutting off the hand for a loan if he denies borrowing it
